p: Microplastics are also emerging contaminants for which a large number of studies have been recently published [ 61]. The physical impact of microplastics in marine environments and organisms have been documented, while their ability to contribute to chemical pollution have been less stressed [ 61]. Indeed, microplastics may sorb and accumulate pollutants due to their chemical properties, small size and large surface to volume ratio, and they generally have a large potential for dispersal even for areas with no major pollution loads [ 31, 61].
